des:
With the "I-GLU" skill you can control the devices connected to I-GLU: manage shutters, awnings, pergolas, lights and much more, simply through your voice. All devices connected to your I-GLU account will be at your complete disposal.
Before installing/using the skill you need to have:
- At least one I-GLU device configured
- An I-GLU user (created during installation of the I-GLU device)
- At least one device (shutter, curtain, light, etc.) controlled by the I-GLU device
To get started, select "Activate Skill" in the Alexa application and associate your I-GLU account (just enter your name and password): after a few seconds in the list of devices you will also find those associated with I-GLU.

ROLLERS (roller shutters, awnings, indoor curtains)
- You can raise/lower a roller: "Alexa, raise [roller name]" or "Alexa, lower [roller name]".
- You can define their position: "Alexa, set [roller name] to X%".
- You can adjust their position: "Alexa, raise [roller name] by X%" or "Alexa, lower [roller name] by X%".

 LIGHTS
- You can turn a light on/off: “Alexa, turn on [light name]” or “Alexa, turn off [light name]”
- You can adjust/change the brightness of the lights: "Alexa, set [light name] to X%" or "Alexa, turn [light name] up by X%"

GROUPS
You can control multiple devices (of the same type) at the same time.
- For a group of lights: "Alexa, turn on [group name]" or "Alexa, turn off [group name]"
- For a group of roller shutters: "Alexa, open [group name]" or "Alexa, close [group name]"

SCENARIOS
You can operate scenarios created in I-GLU: "Alexa, turn on [scenario name]"


WARNING
Some devices may not implement some of the instructions described.
Alexa is able to recognize and interpret certain commands, which are not dependent on Master spa. Device names should be chosen so that they do not create ambiguity or make it difficult for the Alexa device to recognize them. Any operating errors depend on how the Alexa device interprets the command, Master spa cannot act or modify the behavior of the Alexa device in any way.
